Menu.club description: it is your chess club dashboard. here you can manage your players, events and other club settings
Menu.tournaments description: here are all the tournaments related to you. both, where you played and which were organized by your clubs
Menu.about us description: mktour is an open-source project. here you can learn more about the team and the app
Menu.profile description: it's your own page with all your clubs, stats and more

Descriptions.all clubs: explore clubs and their events, join new communities
Descriptions.new club: create new chess club right here
Descriptions.FAQ: learn how to use all mktour's cool features
Descriptions.contact: reach us with questions, ideas, hiring offers and whatever else

Empty.players: there are no players in your club yet
Empty.inbox: claims to moderate tournaments, to link players to users and other club related notifications
Empty.tournaments: there are no tournaments in your club yet

Errors.short club name: too short for a chess club name
Errors.long club name: too long for a chess club name
Errors.short tournament name: too short for a tournament name
Errors.possible players error: error happened while loading club players
Errors.lichess team connected: sorry, this team is already here:

NewClubForm.name: name
NewClubForm.club not saved: sorry! server error happened, club wasn't saved

ForwardToEmpty.message: it seems that you have a club with no finished tournaments: <bold>{club}</bold>. you can just edit it!

Toasts.ws error: live-server error. sorry! you will see no realtime updates
Toasts.user deleted: your profile has been deleted completely

EditUser.name: name
EditUser.confirmation body: this confirmation will immediately delete your profile <bold>completely</bold>. there is no way back! if you're completely sure type your nickname below
EditUser.checkbox2: delete every club i own (with all players)
